aboutpara: I am an Anthropology graduate, Digital Humanities student and Design enthusiast...

resume.description: Passionate about the intersection of technology and culture...

experiences.position: Research and Development Intern at Institute of Network Cultures
experiences.bullets: Practice-based research on digital cultures with cultural analytics and visualization methods

experiences.position: Digital Maker at The Hmm, DEN
experiences.bullets: Mapping cultural digital spaces for digital transformation in the Netherlands
Home visits to enhance elderly digital literacy
Created Instagram filter for Vitamina Festival using Blender and Meta Spark AR
Customer support and issue resolution on Meta social media platforms

education.universityName: International Master's Degree - Digital Humanitites and Digital Knowledge at University of Bologna
education.universityPara: Focus on UX and Web Dev, courses in Data Science, Semantic Web, Visualization, etc.

education2.universityName: Bachelor's Degree - Cultural Anthropology at University of Bologna
education2.universityPara: Thesis on queer Muslim youth through ethnography on social media
